job_tasks.phrase: Samen bouwen we aan de nieuwe generatie onderzoeksmogelijkheden voor advocaten en fiscalisten.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software development activity of building a new generation of research capabilities, which is a fundamental software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: het systeem beter te integreren in het dagelijkse werkproces van de gebruiker
job_tasks.justification: This refers to integrating a system (the AI product) into the user's workflow, which is a key aspect of software integration.

job_tasks.phrase: de kwaliteit van het systeem te verbeteren.
job_tasks.justification: Improving the quality of a system is a general software development task focused on maintenance and enhancement.

job_tasks.phrase: het mogelijk maken om interne documenten van onze klanten te gebruiken
job_tasks.justification: This involves developing functionality to use customer documents, which is a software development task related to data integration and processing within an application.

job_tasks.phrase: een case-builder helpen op te zetten
job_tasks.justification: Setting up a 'case-builder' implies developing a new feature or system, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: continue verbeteringen aan onze codebase door te voeren.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to ongoing software development and maintenance of the codebase.

job_tasks.phrase: zelf aan de slag kan gaan met experimenten om het product te verbeteren met machine learning modellen (zowel open-source als GPT).
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions conducting experiments to improve the product using machine learning models, which aligns with model development and experimentation.

soft_skills.justification: This is a direct mention of a communication skill.
Expressing interest in AI implies a willingness to learn and engage with new technologies in the AI domain.

soft_skills.phrase: krijgt de mogelijkheid om je AI kennis te vergroten.
soft_skills.justification: This indicates an opportunity and expectation for the candidate to expand their knowledge in AI, highlighting a focus on learning and development.

profile.rationale: The job ad primarily focuses on back-end development tasks (1.A.1) such as building new capabilities, integrating systems, improving codebases, and setting up features like a case-builder. While there is an explicit mention of working with machine learning models and conducting experiments (1.B.1), the core responsibilities and the job title ('Back-end Developer') emphasize the software engineering aspect. The AI component is presented as an area of interest and opportunity for growth, rather than the primary focus of the role. Therefore, the role is best classified as an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, where AI is integrated into the software product.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly states the role is 'Back-end Developer' and lists several core software development tasks. It also mentions an interest in AI and the opportunity to work with ML models, but the emphasis remains on the software engineering aspects of integrating and improving the system. The distinction between AI-Adjacent and Core GenAI is clear based on the task distribution. The confidence is high, but not perfect, as the AI component, while not dominant, is present and could be interpreted with slightly more weight by some.
